article.title: Jacobs Technology to Support Electronic Proving Ground
article.text: Jacobs Technology, Tullahoma, Tennessee, was awarded a $52,417,624 contract for scientific and engineering support to the Army Electronic Proving Ground. Bids were solicited via the Internet with eight received. Work will be performed at Fort Huachuca, Arizona, with an estimated completion date of December 31, 2020. Fiscal 2015 research, development, testing and evaluation funds in the amount of $100,000 were obligated at the time of the award. Army Contracting Command, Fort Huachuca, Arizona, is the contracting activity (W91RUS-16-C-0006).
